title: Ubawarerukoto Marugoto Zenbu
description:
1-3: Ubawarerukoto Marugoto Zenbu
Yoshinaga is madly in love with Takao. However, Takao is in love with big tits. Facing such a frivolous lover, Yoshinaga needs to use all ways to tame Takao. But will Takao really listen and give up big tits? 

4-5: Dancing On The Horizon
Takeharu has been fearful of water ever since his father fell out of his boat while fishing, never to be seen again. His cousin, Toshizou, had once traveled the world but is now a freeloader at his place. Will Toshizou be able to help Takeharu overcome his trauma? Or will the same sequence of events occur?

[b][u]Polish / Polski:[/u][/b]
[spoiler]Yoshinaga na zabój kocha się w Takao i zrobiłby wszystko, żeby zrobić z niego swojego kochanka. Jest jednak jeden problem - Takao na zabój kocha się w cycuszkach. Z facetem rozpuszczonym jak dziadowski bicz nie jest łatwo sobie poradzić, więc Yoshinaga musi dołożyć wszelkich starań, aby na dobre usidlić swojego wybranka. A może po prostu porywa się z motyką na słońce?

related.title: Suki to Iu no ni Naze Kashira
